trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 定义用来标记行尾的专用的文本运行。

trans-unit.source: The text engine client can use the TextEndOfLine class to create a custom linebreak representation.
trans-unit.target: 文本引擎客户端可以使用 TextEndOfLine 类来创建自定义 linebreak 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> class using a specified character length.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref>类使用指定的字符长度。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> buffer.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> class using a specified character length and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref>类使用指定的字符长度和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> buffer.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value to use for the characters in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> buffer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref>要用于在中的字符值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref>缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> character buffer.
Gets the character length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取的字符长度的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref>字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> object that represents the length of the character buffer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>对象，表示字符缓冲区的长度。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取共享的每个文本字符的属性集<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfLine"></xref>字符缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"></xref> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties"> </xref>表示共享的每个文本字符的属性的值。
